scripts.deploy:uni-v3:base-sepolia: pnpm prepare:deploy base-sepolia uni-v3 && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-uni-v3-base-sepolia -l 0.0.21

scripts.deploy:uni-v3:taiko: pnpm prepare:deploy taiko uni-v3 && pnpm codegen && graph build && goldsky subgraph deploy metrom-uni-v3-taiko/0.0.12
scripts.deploy:baseswap:base: pnpm prepare:deploy base baseswap && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-baseswap-base -l 0.0.12
scripts.deploy:uni-v3:base: pnpm prepare:deploy base uni-v3 && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-uni-v3-base -l 0.0.12
